headline: Last year Chiptole launched a game to win a Tesla. No winner was ever announced
description:
On June 23, 2021, Chipotle announced "Race to Rewards" contest, a top down retro racing game where players had 48 hours to try and get the highest score playing. There were various prizes in the top 10 list, with #1 being a Tesla Model 3.

The racing game was mainly one of endurance, the longer a player could last without crashing, the greater their chances of getting higher score. It didn't take long for some players to write scripts to keep their car going for hours, automatically detecting obstacles and switching lanes. Nowhere in the contest rules was this or any kind of scripted play explicitly forbidden.

Despite this, the contest period came and went, and Chipotle has never made an official announcement on any winners for the top 10 prizes, including the Model 3.

Several media outlets reported on the contest when it was launched. Apparently none of them followed up on the winners.
headline_zh-Hans: 去年，Chiptole推出了一个赢得特斯拉的游戏。从来没有宣布过获胜者
headline_zh-Hant: 去年，Chiptole推出了一個贏得特斯拉的遊戲。從來沒有宣佈過獲勝者
description_zh-Hans:
2021年6月23日，Chipotle宣布了"Race to Rewards"比赛，这是一个自上而下的复古赛车游戏，玩家有48小时的时间来尝试获得最高分的游戏。前10名名单中有各种奖品，第1名是特斯拉Model 3。

赛车游戏主要是耐力的问题，玩家能坚持越久而不崩溃，他们获得高分的机会就越大。没过多久，一些玩家就写好了脚本，让他们的车持续几个小时，自动检测障碍物和切换车道。

尽管如此，比赛期间来了又走，Chipotle从未正式宣布前10名奖品的获奖者，包括Model 3。显然，他们都没有跟进获奖者的情况。
description_zh-Hant:
2021年6月23日，Chipotle宣佈了"Race to Rewards"比賽，這是一個自上而下的復古賽車遊戲，玩家有48小時的時間來嘗試獲得最高分的遊戲。前10名名單中有各種獎品，第1名是特斯拉Model 3。

賽車遊戲主要是耐力的問題，玩家能堅持越久而不崩潰，他們獲得高分的機會就越大。沒過多久，一些玩家就寫好了腳本，讓他們的車持續幾個小時，自動檢測障礙物和切換車道。

儘管如此，比賽期間來了又走，Chipotle從未正式宣佈前10名獎品的獲獎者，包括Model 3。顯然，他們都沒有跟進獲獎者的情況。
